import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Ship, Plus, FileText, Wrench } from 'lucide-react'; import { useVessel } from "../../context/VesselContext"; // Assurez-vous que le chemin est correct function AddVessel() { const { addVessel } = useVessel(); const [vesselData, setVesselData] = useState({ // Informations de base vesselName: "", imoNumber: "", vesselType: "", yearBuilt: "", flag: "", // Caractéristiques techniques length: "", beam: "", draft: "", grossTonnage: "", deadWeight: "", // Équipements principaux mainEngine: { brand: "", model: "", power: "", rpm: "", }, auxiliaryEngines: [], generators: [], // Certifications certificates: [], }); const vesselTypes = [ "Tanker", "Container Ship", "Bulk Carrier", "General Cargo", "Car Carrier", "LNG Carrier", "Passenger Ship", "Fishing Vessel", "Offshore Support", ]; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setVesselData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })); }; const handleMainEngineChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setVesselData((prev) => ({ ...prev, mainEngine: { ...prev.mainEngine, [name]: value, }, })); }; // Fonctions pour gérer les tableaux dynamiques (auxiliaryEngines, generators, certificates) const handleAddAuxiliaryEngine = () => { setVesselData((prev) => ({ ...prev, auxiliaryEngines: [ ...prev.auxiliaryEngines, { brand: "", model: "", power: "", rpm: "" }, ], })); }; const handleRemoveAuxiliaryEngine = (index) => { setVesselData((prev) => ({ ...prev, auxiliaryEngines: prev.auxiliaryEngines.filter((_, i) => i !== index), })); }; const handleAuxiliaryEngineChange = (index, e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setVesselData((prev) => ({ ...prev, auxiliaryEngines: prev.auxiliaryEngines.map((engine, i) => i === index ? { ...engine, [name]: value } : engine ), })); }; // Fonctions similaires pour generators (handleAddGenerator, handleRemoveGenerator, handleGeneratorChange) // et certificates (handleAddCertificate, handleRemoveCertificate, handleCertificateChange) // ... à implémenter si nécessaire const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("handleSubmit appelé"); // Pour le débogage console.log("addVessel:", addVessel); // Pour le débogage addVessel(vesselData); // On appelle addVessel du contexte avec les données du formulaire // Réinitialiser le formulaire ici si nécessaire setVesselData({ vesselName: "", imoNumber: "", vesselType: "", yearBuilt: "", flag: "", length: "", beam: "", draft: "", grossTonnage: "", deadWeight: "", mainEngine: { brand: "", model: "", power: "", rpm: "", }, auxiliaryEngines: [], generators: [], certificates: [], }); }; return (
{/* Informations de base */}

Basic Information

{/* Caractéristiques techniques */}

Technical Specifications

{/* Équipements principaux */}

Main Equipments

{/* Main Engine Details */}

Main Engine

{/* Auxiliary Engines */}

Auxiliary Engines

{vesselData.auxiliaryEngines.map((engine, index) => (
handleAuxiliaryEngineChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleAuxiliaryEngineChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleAuxiliaryEngineChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleAuxiliaryEngineChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
))}

Generators

{vesselData.generators.map((generator, index) => (
handleGeneratorChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleGeneratorChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleGeneratorChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleGeneratorChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
))}
{ /* Certifications */ }

Certifications

List of Certificates

{vesselData.certificates.map((certificate, index) => (
handleCertificateChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleCertificateChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleCertificateChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
handleCertificateChange(index, e)} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500" />
))}
{ /* Boutons de soumission */ }
); } export default AddVessel;
